message.content: {"given_definition_quality":50,"better_definition":"page (of a book or paper)","sentence":"我有一本书，有五页。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style image of an open Chinese book lying on a table, clearly showing five separate pages. The focus is on the individual pages, with a hint of age or wear, evoking a quiet, dramatic end-of-days mood.","sentence_translation":"I have a book with five pages."}
